Comics / Diversity

Daniel & Elias (Pilot 2014) / Comics Shirley (comic pilot) / Comics

About this comic

Tackling the issue of LGBT rights from a child’s perspective is always a challenge, not precisely from the angle of kids themselves but because of how the rest of people will interpret it. So here I wanted to play with the symbolism of colors, as if “what is on a color anyway?” — to bring the point that deep down we are all alike and deserve the same rights and opportunities in life.
